jobTransform.doc: TimingTest_RDOtoRDOTrigger menu on top events see: https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/ATLASRECTS-2408
jobTransform.jobTransformCmd: cp /afs/cern.ch/atlas/project/trigger/pesa-sw/validation/references/RDOtoRDOTrigger_template/* ./ ; ./runwrapper.RDOtoRDOTrigger.sh ; perl -i.clean -pe 's/^[\d:]+ //' log.RDOtoRDOTrigger ; grep -B1 -e "PMonSD..evt" log.RDOtoRDOTrigger | head -20 > timing.log ; if [[ `head -2 timing.log | grep -c 'Trig'` == 1 ]]; then echo "Timing ERROR : a TriggerChain runs longer than StreamBS - this should not be the case - please consult / check: timing.log - Thank you" > timing_check_log; fi ; grep -B 1 -e "evtloop_time" log.RDOtoRDOTrigger > average_time_per_event.log ; if [[ `grep "[0-9]" average_time_per_event.log | awk '{print $4}'` -gt 30000 ]]; then echo "Timing ERROR : the average cpu time per event is too large > 30000 - this should not be the case - please consult / check: average_time_per_event.log - Thank you" > average_time_per_event_ERROR_log; fi

athena.doc: Physics_pp_v7 menu on minbias RDO
Runs Physics_pp_v7 menu on ttbar dumping 1k events in an xAOD
Physics_pp_v7_tight_physics menu on minbias RDO
Test of Physics_HI_v3 menu on RDO
Test of Physics_HI_v4 menu on RDO

Test of MC_HI_v3_tight_mc_prescale menu on RDO
Test of MC_HI_v4 menu on ttbar RDO
Runs B-jet signature on ttbar RDO

Runs B-physics slice on user.tursom.mc12_14TeV.208410.Pythia8B_AU2_CTEQ6L1_Bs_Jpsimu6mu6_phi_KK.recon.v6_EXT0 RDOs (until Bs->J/Psi mu mu RDO mc12_8TeV.208002.Pythia8B_AU2_CTEQ6L1_pp_Jpsimu6mu6.recon.RDO.e1331_a159_a190 is availible)

Runs B-physics slice on user.tursom.mc12_14TeV.208410.Pythia8B_AU2_CTEQ6L1_Bs_Jpsimu6mu6_phi_KK.recon.v6_EXT0 RDOs (until Bs->J/Psi mu mu RDO mc12_8TeV.208002.Pythia8B_AU2_CTEQ6L1_pp_Jpsimu6mu6.recon.RDO.e1331_a159_a190 is availible)
Runs B-physics AND Muon slice on mc15_13TeV.180593.Pythia8_AUMSTW2008LO_Wtaunu_3mu_noPhotos see ATR-13193
Runs Electron signature on ttbar RDO (until RDO mc12_14TeV.147806.PowhegPythia8_AU2CT10_Zee.recon.RDO.e1564_s1682_s1691_r4710 is availible)
Runs Electron slice on ttbar RDO (until mc10_14TeV.106046.PythiaZee_no_filter.digit.RDO.e662_s1107_d459 mu=46, no IBL is availible)
Runs Tau signature on ttbar RDO (until Z tau tau RDO is availible)
Runs Jet signature on ttbar RDO
Runs MET signature on ttbar RDO
Runs MinBias signature on ttbar RDO
Runs MinBias_Enhanced signature on ttbar RDO
Runs Muon signature on ttbar RDO
LVL1 only test- with default menu

arg.argvalue: if [ -f trig_cost.root ] ; then RunTrigCostD3PD.exe -f trig_cost.root --outputTagFromAthena --costMode --linkOutputDir ; else echo file trig_cost.root does not exist thus RunTrigCostD3PD.exe will not be run ; fi
if [[ `sed 's|.*\(.* \)|\1|' L1AV.txt | sed 's/^[ \t]*//' | sed '/^0/'d | wc -l` == 0 ]]; then echo L1 counts ERROR : all entires are ZERO please consult L1AV.txt ; fi
if [[ `sed 's|.*\(.* \)|\1|' HLTChain.txt | sed 's/^[ \t]*//' | sed '/^0/'d | wc -l` == 0 ]]; then echo HLTChain counts ERROR : all entires are ZERO please consult HLTChain.txt ; fi
if [[ `sed 's|.*\(.* \)|\1|' HLTTE.txt | sed 's/^[ \t]*//' | sed '/^0/'d | wc -l` == 0 ]]; then echo HLTTE counts ERROR : all entires are ZERO please consult HLTTE.txt ; fi
